description: The L.12.12 Blanc Eau de Toilette, inspired by the iconic Lacoste polo shirt, is a modern, masculine fragrance with a woody aromatic scent. A blend of juicy grapefruit and warm cardamom with vetiver and soft suede, creating an overall feel of elegance and comfort.The bottle and outer pack feature our iconic ‘petit piqué’ pattern, inspired by the texture of our polo shirts. Each bottle also features Lacoste’s authentic embroidered crocodile, just like our polos.
